title: Bradley Cooper all smiles as he takes on daddy duties with daughter Lea De Seine
text:
Bradley Cooper enjoyed a day out with daughter Lea De Seine (Picture: Splash)

Bradley Cooper got right back to daddy duties with daughter Lea De Seine, as they enjoyed a day out in New York.

The A Star Is Born actor – who shares the two-year-old with ex Irina Shayk – couldn’t stop smiling as he spent time with Lea in the West Village.

At one point, the 44-year-old could be seen carrying the little one as they hit the streets.

He opted for a casual look for the day, heading out in a navy zip-up jacket and bright red trousers, completing the outfit with a backwards cap.

And just like that, we’re back in the 90s.

While two-year-old Lea was decked out in a grey outfit, with a pair of colourful trainers.

The pair headed out in New York (Picture: Splash)

Bradley was seen carrying little Lea in the West Village (Picture: Splash)

Bradley and Irina recently came to a custody agreement over little Lea, after they split earlier this year.

Advertisement

Advertisement

They reportedly had an amicable break-up, following a four-year relationship, but working out an arrangement on their only child was a little more complicated.

It was claimed model Irina, 33, was keen to stay in New York, while the actor wanted to move to LA for work.

Bradley and Irina welcomed Lea two years ago (Picture: Splash)

According to TMZ, they managed to work things out and decided to both stay in the big apple, sharing custody.

They called time on their relationship back in June, and have both been linked to a string of faces ever since – and an insider revealed both Bradley and Irina are open to dating.

‘They want to date, and won’t be shy about meeting people or being set up,’ the source told Us Weekly.

Bradley Cooper and Irina Shayk split back in June after four years together (Picture: Getty)

‘They’re closing a long chapter of their lives, but they’re ready to see what’s next.’

Another suggested the model is ‘taking time to heal’ after their relationship broke down.

‘Irina isn’t dating anyone at the moment,’ they added to E! News.

‘She’s focused on her daughter and spending time with her. She would like to meet someone in the future, but it’s not a priority at the moment.

‘She just got out of a long-term relationship and wants to take time to heal.’

Which is fair enough.
